Home Ethics

About the IT Ethics Project

This project explores the application of ethical principles in the field of Information Technology, with a focus on software development. It is designed using Jekyll, a popular static site generator, showcasing how web technologies can be utilized for educational and informational purposes.

More information about Jekyll and its usage can be found at jekyllrb.com.

Discover the source code for Jekyll at GitHub: jekyll/jekyll.
